sec.p: By study conclusion, 171 (50%) clinicians had participated in one or more EBP initiatives. Of this group, 100 clinicians (29%) had participated in one, 39 (12%) participated in two, 19 (6%) participated in three, ten (3%) participated in four, and three (1%) participated in five initiatives. See TableÂ 1 for the average number of initiatives clinicians had participated in by wave.
